con:settings.con:setting: <xml-fragment xmlns:con="http://eviware.com/soapui/config"> <con:entry key="Report Format(s)" value=""/> <con:entry key="Host:Port" value=""/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export All" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Save After" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Add Settings" value="false"/> <con:entry key="WSS Password Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestSuite" value="Swagger Petstore TestSuite"/> <con:entry key="Endpoint" value=""/> <con:entry key="Select Report Type" value=""/> <con:entry key="System Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="Print Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Open Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Export JUnit Results with test properties" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Global Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Properties" value=""/> <con:entry key="Project Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestCase" value="<all>"/> <con:entry key="Username" value=""/> <con:entry key="user-settings.xml Password" value=""/> <con:entry key="TestRunner Path" value=""/> <con:entry key="Environment" value="Default"/> <con:entry key="Coverage Report" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Enable UI" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Root Folder" value=""/> <con:entry key="Ignore Errors" value="false"/> <con:entry key="Domain" value=""/> <con:entry key="Tool Args" value=""/> <con:entry key="Save Project" value="false"/> </xml-fragment>

con:interface.name: Swagger Petstore
con:interface.con:description: This is a sample server Petstore server. You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/). For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

con:method.name: uploadFile
con:method.con:description: uploads an image

con:parameter.con:name: additionalMetadata
con:parameter.con:description: Additional data to pass to server

con:method.name: addPet
con:method.con:description: Add a new pet to the store

con:method.name: updatePet
con:method.con:description: Update an existing pet

con:method.name: findPetsByStatus
con:method.con:description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings Finds Pets by status

con:parameter.con:name: status
con:parameter.con:description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

con:method.name: findPetsByTags
con:method.con:description: Multiple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing. Finds Pets by tags

con:method.name: getPetById
con:method.con:description: Returns a single pet Find pet by ID

con:method.name: updatePetWithForm
con:method.con:description: Updates a pet in the store with form data

con:method.name: deletePet
con:method.con:description: Deletes a pet

con:method.name: placeOrder
con:method.con:description: Place an order for a pet

con:parameter.con:name: orderId
con:parameter.con:description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted

con:method.name: getOrderById
con:method.con:description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10. Other values will generated exceptions Find purchase order by ID

con:method.name: deleteOrder
con:method.con:description: For valid response try integer IDs with positive integer value. Negative or non-integer values will generate API errors Delete purchase order by ID

con:method.name: getInventory
con:method.con:description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities Returns pet inventories by status

con:method.name: createUsersWithArrayInput
con:method.con:description: Creates list of users with given input array

con:method.name: createUsersWithListInput
con:method.con:description: Creates list of users with given input array

con:parameter.con:name: username
con:parameter.con:description: The name that needs to be deleted

con:method.name: getUserByName
con:method.con:description: Get user by user name

con:method.name: updateUser
con:method.con:description: This can only be done by the logged in user. Updated user

con:method.name: deleteUser
con:method.con:description: This can only be done by the logged in user. Delete user

con:method.name: loginUser
con:method.con:description: Logs user into the system

con:parameter.con:name: password
con:parameter.con:description: The password for login in clear text

con:method.name: logoutUser
con:method.con:description: Logs out current logged in user session

con:method.name: createUser
con:method.con:description: This can only be done by the logged in user. Create user

con:testSuite.name: Swagger Petstore TestSuite
con:testSuite.con:description: TestSuite generated for REST Service [Swagger Petstore]
